rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed for Indian culinary practices, integrating local design elements with modern amenities while ensuring wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious dining space with ambient lighting and decorative Chettinad style detailing. Vastu-aligned placement encourages communal interaction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living area with open spaces and floor-to-ceiling windows, ensuring natural ventilation and ample daylight as per local architectural standards.

openings.description: Large open area overlooking the swimming pool, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and Chettinad style detailing.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Balanced room layout with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and Vastu-aligned decor.

rooms.name: Bathroom
